name: wahyd4/aria2-ariang-docker demo
description: A demo of Aria2 + AriaNg + Filebrowser + Rclone

ENABLE_AUTH.description: This value must be heroku when running in Heroku

RCLONE_CONFIG_BASE64.description: This value is the base64 string of your preconfigured /app/conf/rclone.conf content

ARIA2_EXTERNAL_PORT.description: External port for apps, it should be 443 when running in Heroku

PUID.description: The Linux user's ID that to run the app

PGID.description: The Linux group's ID that to run the app
